Assessment.QuestionText: You want to fill a rectangle with black color and print it using the <font face="courier new">PrintDocument</font> class. Which one of the following codes will help you to achieve this?

Options.Option:
PrintDocument printDocument = new PrintDocument();
printDocument.DocumentName = "GraphicsObjects";
printDocument.PrintPage += new PrintPageEventHandler(printDocument_PrintPage);
printDocument.Print();
private void printDocument_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)
{
   e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Black, ClientRectangle);
}

PrintDocument printDocument = new PrintDocument();
printDocument.DocumentName = "GraphicsObjects";
printDocument.PrintPage = new PrintPageEventHandler(printDocument_PrintPage);
printDocument.Print();
private void printDocument_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)
{
   Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Black, ClientRectangle);
}

PrintDocument printDocument = new PrintDocument();
printDocument.DocumentName = "GraphicsObjects";
printDocument.PrintPage = new PrintPageEventHandler(printDocument_PrintPage);
printDocument.Print();
private void printDocument_PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)
{
   Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes, ClientRectangle);
}

PrintDocument printDocument = new PrintDocument();
printDocument.DocumentName = "GraphicsObjects";
printDocument.PrintPage += new PrintPageEventHandler(printDocument);
printDocument.Print();
private void PrintPage(object sender, PrintPageEventArgs e)
{
   e.Graphics.FillRectangle(Brushes.Black, ClientRectangle);
}

Assessment.CorrectFeedback: Yes, that's correct! You get one point for your response.
Assessment.incorrectFeedback: No, that's incorrect. The correct selection is: (A).
